title: Love Island Australia: Maurice and Phoebe knew other before the show
text:
She entered the Love Island Australia villa on Wednesday as an intruder.

But it seems Phoebe Thompson already knew one of the contestants before making her debut on the show.

A photo has emerged of Phoebe, 28, posing alongside Maurice Salib in 2015, sparking rumours they could have romantic history.

They've got history! A photo of Love Island Australia stars Maurice Salib (far right) and Phoebe Thompson (second from left) posing alongside one another in 2015 has emerged

The photo, which was uploaded to Phoebe's Instagram account, shows her and Maurice wearing matching outfits.

She captioned the post: 'Throwback to when @mindaayyy was on the hunt for brown people... #Sydney #models.'

While it's unclear if they ever dated, the image appears to confirm they have crossed paths as models.

Going way back: While it's unclear if they ever dated, the image appears to confirm they have crossed paths as models. Pictured: Phoebe Thompson

It comes after a video surfaced showing that Vanessa Sierra and Adam Farrugia also knew each other before appearing on Love Island.

Footage emerged on Tuesday of the two reality stars dining at a restaurant together in May.

Although they weren't sitting next to each other, Vanessa and Adam appeared to be getting along well as they were joined by several other friends.

Fancy seeing you here! Maurice has yet to address his history with Phoebe on the show

Interestingly, Adam chose Vanessa out of all of the girls upon his arrival at the villa.

Vanessa wasn't thrilled about the pairing, however, saying that bad boy Adam 'had trouble written all over him.'

She later traded him in for DJ Sam Withers during a recoupling ceremony.
description: She entered the  Love Island Australia villa on Wednesday as an intruder.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
